
### Vienna patterns (1) 

<!-- \lstset{
        style=small,
        language={},
        moredelim={**[is][\btHL<2|handout:0>]{@hi2@}{@endhi@}},
        escapechar=`,

* simple Vienna patterns:
 
<pre><code>/* bytes of fixed part of Vienna sample */
\\xFC\\x89\\xD6\\x83\\xC6\\x81\\xc7\\x00\\x01\\x83`\\textit{(etc)}` {
        printf("found Vienna code\\n");
    }
</code></pre>


### Vienna patterns (2)  {.smaller}

<!-- \lstset{
        style=small,
        language={},
        moredelim={**[is][\btHL<2|handout:0>]{@hi2@}{@endhi@}},
        escapechar=`,
        } -->
 

* simple Vienna patterns:
 
<pre><code>/* Vienna sample with wildcards for
   changing bytes: */
/* push %CX; mov ???, %dx; cld; ... */
\\x51\\xBA<span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">(.|\n)(.|\n)</span>\\xFC\\x89`\\textit{(etc)}` {
        printf("found Vienna code w/placeholder\\n");
    }
/* mov $0x100, %di; push %di; xor %di, %di; ret */
\\xBF\\x00\\x01\\x57\\x31\\xFF\\xC3 {
        printf("found Vienna return code\\n");
    }
</code></pre>
